Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt presents with mild flatulence, mild cough and mild abdominal pain for past 2 days. he is a 44 yr old M. he reports having no more than one drink a day he does not smoke o:Height 76 in, Weight 146 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 16, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = LUQ tenderness and rebound tenderness, Heart = RRR, loud S2 a:Abdominal Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed famotidine - 40 mg daily, and ordered Glucose, Serum.

td.content: s:patient complained of mild cough, mild flatulence and mild abdominal pain. patient denied any fall or trauma. NKDA. he is a m cryptographer aged 45 ys. o:Height 75 in, Weight 141 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = LUQ tenderness and rebound tenderness, Heart = RRR, loud S2 a:Abdominal Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed famotidine - 40 mg daily, and ordered Glucose, Serum.
